sourcesContent:
import React, { useState,useEffect} from 'react'; import swal from 'sweetalert'; import { Table,Checkbox } from 'semantic-ui-react'; const RequestLog=() =>{ const[reqNo,setReq]=useState("") const[cAddress,setCaddress]=useState("") const[description,setDes]=useState("") const[amount,setAmount]=useState("") const[recipient,setRecp]=useState("") const[donors,setDonors]=useState("") const[voters,setVoters]=useState("") const reqInfo={ reqNO:"", cAddress:"", description:"", amount:"", recipient:"", donors:"", voters:"" } const[Requests,setRequests]=useState([reqInfo]) return (

REQUEST CREATION

setDes(e.target.value)}>
setAmount(e.target.value)}>
setRecp(e.target.value)}>

Request Info:

Request_NO Creator Description: Amount: Recipient: Voters/Donors {Requests.map((request,index) => ( reqNO cAddress description amount recipient voters/donors ) )}
); } export default RequestLog
